headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Hangar On
content: You can tell a lot about an international smuggling baron from the size of their hangar – but don’t panic, we’ve got you covered. Not only is this temple to private aviation fully customizable; not only is it capable of housing almost every type of plane and helicopter known to man; but it’s also the only place you can install your very own Aircraft Workshop, where you can fine tune your squadron’s weapons, looks and performance to your heart’s content.
